name: selfhosted-mqtt-broker-nodejs
description: Simple MQTT broker written in nodejs, local persistence, minimal stdout with docker.

scripts.docker: docker rm -f selfhosted-mqtt-broker-nodejs-walt; docker build . -t selfhosted-mqtt-broker-nodejs-walt; docker run --restart always -p 1883:1883 --network web -d --name selfhosted-mqtt-broker-nodejs-walt selfhosted-mqtt-broker-nodejs-walt
